one line: A 41-year-old @Race @Sex  with recent unprotected sexual intercourse and recent sick contact presents with acute-onset pharyngitis and systemic symptoms of fever, tachcyardia, diarrhea, and rash — without apparent URI symptoms.
DDx:
Viral pharyngitis,
Acute HIV infection,
Bacterial pharyngitis,
Acute EBV infection (mononucleosis)
Bacterial meningitis

one line: A 22-year-old @Race @Sex  presents with pharyngitis, myalgias, neck pain, tachycardia, fever, and headache, without cough and coryza — and two negative home SARS-CoV-2 antigen tests.
DDx:
Viral pharyngitis,
Group A streptococcal pharyngitis,
Septic thrombophlebitis (Lemierre's Syndrome)
Acute EBV infection (mononucleosis),
Acute HIV infection,
Deep neck space infection

one line: A 45-year-old @Race @Sex with recent sick contact and high-risk sexual exposures presents with pharyngitis with shallow pharyngeal ulcers, tender lymphadenopathy, fever, tachycardia, and a diffuse maculopapular rash.
DDx:
Acute HIV,
Viral pharyngitis,
Group A streptococcal pharyngitis,
Gonococcal pharyngitis
